QuestData.Title: To Catch a Shadow
QuestData.Description: Gul'dan is on the Shadow Rise just up the hill to the west. But, you must hurry, $n. We know that he's about to leave for Talador and Frostfire Ridge.$B$BThe use of the soul trap is straightforward. Simply point and shoot to ensnare Gul'dan. The crystal will take care of the rest.$B$BI'll see you back at Starfall Outpost when you have him.$B$BGood luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Gul'dan's Soul Trap on Gul'dan.
QuestData.RewardText: Unfortunate, but not surprising. At least we were able to defeat one of the inner council members.$B$BAll is not lost, $n. We know what the Shadow Council is up to and where they're heading.$B$BWe'll regroup in Talador. Together, we'll put an end to Teron'gor and his plans for Auchindoun.$B$BDid you hear that?
